content.description: Four forces of equal magnitude are exerted on a square at theÂ locations and in the directions indicated in the figure. Points <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mtext>A</mtext></math> and <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mtext>B</mtext></math> are labeled for reference.
content.question: Which of the forces, if any, exerts zero torque about Point <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math>?

choices.label: Both <math alttext="F sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="F sub 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>
None of the forces exert zero torque about Point <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math>

content.answer: Both <math alttext="F sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="F sub 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>
